[地名] [加拿大、美国] 奥特卢克

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都有"期望，指望"之意。
means: expectation ： 指期待某事发生或假设某事能发生，多含揣想的意味。
hope ： 通常指建立在愿望基础上的期待。这种期待有可能发生或实现，但也可能相反。
outlook ： 多指根据征兆或分析对要发生的事情的愿望或预料。
prospect与outlook的含义相近，但侧重对成功、利润和舒适生活等方面的期待。

sentence.Network_en: He remained for some years avowedly radical in his political outlook.
sentence.Network_cn: 他多年来保持公然激进的政治观。

sentence.Network_en: The illness had a profound effect on his outlook.
sentence.Network_cn: 这场病对他的人生观产生了深刻的影响。

sentence.Network_en: The changed outlook entails higher economic growth than was previously assumed.
sentence.Network_cn: 观念的改变势必会使得经济增长高于之前预计的水平。

entry.tran: 世界观；人生观；（对生活的）观点，看法
entry.def: Your outlook is your general attitude towards life.

example.ex: The illness had a profound effect on his outlook...
example.tran: 这场病对他的人生观产生了深刻的影响。

example.ex: I adopted a positive outlook on life...
example.tran: 我开始抱持积极向上的人生观。

entry.def: The outlook for something is what people think will happen in relation to it.

example.ex: The economic outlook is one of rising unemployment...
example.tran: 展望未来的经济，失业率将会上升。

example.ex: Has motherhood changed your career outlook?
example.tran: 当了母亲是否改变了你的职业前途？

means.word_mean: 1. a habitual or characteristic mental attitude that determines how you will interpret and respond to situations
2. belief about (or mental picture of) the future

auth_sentence.content: But in other respects the outlook is less certain.
auth_sentence.res_content: But in other respects the outlook is less certain.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But in other respects the outlook is less certain.

auth_sentence.content: It is a reflection of the dire economic outlook.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is a reflection of the dire economic outlook.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is a reflection of the dire economic outlook.

auth_sentence.content: Grim outlook So why is Italy in trouble now?
auth_sentence.res_content: Grim outlook So why is Italy in trouble now?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Grim outlook So why is Italy in trouble now?

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"出去.过时,外面"; 2. 表示"超过.过度"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 室外的, 户外的, 野外的
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+door门→adj.室外的, 户外的, 野外的
out出去.过时,外面+er→adj.外部的,外面的,外层的
out出去.过时,外面+going走→走出来→心胸宽→待人友善的
out出去.过时,外面+land地+ish……的→外地来的→奇异的
out出去.过时,外面+ward方向→向外的
out超过.过度+size范围→范围超出
out超过.过度+standing标准的→adj.突出的, 显著的
out出去.过时,外面→adv.出外;在外 v.公布
out出去.过时,外面+door户+s→n.户外 adv.在户外, 在野外
out出去.过时,外面+side旁边→在外边
out出去.过时,外面+ward方向→向外的
out出去.过时,外面+break中断→事情断裂→爆发
out出去.过时,外面+door户+s→n.户外 adv.在户外, 在野外
out出去.过时,外面+flow流→流出

stems_affixes.value_cn: 外出, 旅行, 散步
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+ing状态→n.外出, 旅行, 散步
out出去.过时,外面+let表名词→n.出口, 出路
out出去.过时,外面+line线条→划出线条→大纲

stems_affixes.value_cn: 景色, 风光, 观点
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+look看→n.景色, 风光, 观点

stems_affixes.value_cn: 产量, 输出, 输出量
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+put放,摆→放出,输出→产量
out出去.过时,外面+rage怒气→怒气外露→粗暴
out出去.过时,外面+set安置好→在外面放置好→开端
out出去.过时,外面+skirt裙子;引申为城市周边+s→郊区
out出去.过时,外面+work工作→户外工作;在工作上胜过
out超过.过度+law法律→超越法律之人
out出去.过时,外面→adv.出外;在外 v.公布
out出去.过时,外面+flow流→流出
out出去.过时,外面+work工作→户外工作;在工作上胜过
out超过.过度+bid出价→出价超出
out超过.过度+do做→做得超出别人
out超过.过度+live活→超过别人活着
out超过.过度+number数量→v.在数量上超过
out超过.过度+wear穿→穿出了[洞]
out超过.过度+wit智慧→机智超出别人

sentences.en: I have a good outlook from my bedroom.
sentences.cn: 我的卧室有很好的窗景。

means.word_mean: 观点；见解；世界观；人生观

sentences.en: He has a broad outlook on life.
The outlook for the economy is bright.

sentences.cn: 她比她所有的女友都漂亮。

jushi.english: The outlook for the economy is bright.
He has been on the outlook for an opportunity.
jushi.chinese: 他一直耐心地等待机会。
